---
title: "info_buttons_completion"
output: 
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: rows
    vertical_layout: fill
runtime: shiny
---


```{r}

# Show information about DMP completion

# Add action button and style it. 

actionButton(inputId = "info_completion", 
             label = "",
             class = "btn-xs",
             icon = icon("info-circle", verify_fa = FALSE),
             style = "background-color: #337ab7; 
                      border: 2px solid #8CBBD2; 
                      border-radius: 5px;")


# Show information about the DMP completion.

observeEvent(input$info_completion, {
  
  showModal(
    modalDialog(title = "Information on completion rate",
                easyClose = TRUE,
                footer = NULL,
                tags$div(
                         tags$p(strong("DMP completion: "),
                                "The completion percentage categories shown here 
                                represent the proportion of questions answered 
                                in a given DMP template. A value of 100% indicates 
                                that all questions have been answered, while a value 
                                in the category '< 25%' indicates that the DMP is nearly
                                empty. Note: answering a question does 
                                not necessarily guarantee the quality of the 
                                response."),
                         )
                )
          )
})

```
